content: elevate your winter wardrobe with the olivewood scarf crochet pattern the seamless design is a comfortable and versatile addition to any outfit the reversible trinity stitch adds depth and dimension to the scarf making it a standout piece for any occasion crochet this unisex adult scarf using the brava stripe yarn from knit picks for a cozy and colorful finish **unique features-** easy-level pattern for all skill levels seamless construction for a polished look reversible trinity stitch adds texture and dimension unisex design suitable for adults perfect for wearing gifting and charity donations crochet written pattern for clear instructions right and left-handed video tutorials for additional help included **materials needed-** us-j 6 0 mm hook **furls** https //tidd ly/4l6y8yy 370 yds **we crochet brava stripe** https //tidd ly/4ma1tuh 4 - medium 100% acrylic 218 yds **stitch markers** https //amzn to/3tyhdg4
